name: Conludus
description:
Conludus is an interactive learning system that uses gamification to make studying information technology more engaging and fun. The system is designed to help users learn about various topics of computer science through a series of interactive modules.

At the moment, Conludus has three modules for training and checking knowledge in the sections “Number systems”, “Logical operations”, and “Programming”. However, the number of modules is actively increasing and becoming better. This means that users can expect even more engaging and interactive content in the future.

The system is set in a 3D space where users move from one room to another. An AI robot assistant named “Vector” provides users with various information depending on where they are in the system. In addition to the modules, there is also a separate quest where users receive tasks in different sections. At each level of the quest, the complexity of tasks increases randomly.

Conludus also features a table of records that takes into account the time it takes to complete the quest. Users can participate in tournaments separately for each section, and tables of records for each section are maintained independently.

Whether you’re a beginner or an experienced IT professional, Conludus is an excellent way to learn about information technology in a fun and engaging way. With its interactive modules, AI robot assistant, and separate quest, Conludus is sure to keep you engaged and motivated as you learn about number systems, logical operations, programming, and more.
